metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2321 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The loopback plug-in in ConnMan before 0.85 allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the (1) host name or(2) domain name in a DHCP reply.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2321` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

connman - 1.15-0ubuntu3
connman-vpn - 1.15-0ubuntu3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: connman package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15-0ubuntu3').
